type1_missing.reasoning: Next.js middleware file completely missing - spec requires middleware to protect /dashboard routes and redirect authenticated users from login/register pages
POST /api/auth/logout endpoint not implemented - logout folder exists but contains no route file
Email validation regex not implemented anywhere - spec requires `/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/` validation but no validateEmail function exists in validation.ts
Client-side email format validation missing on login page - spec requires client-side validation for email format but page only uses HTML5 type='email'
Client-side email format validation missing on registration page - spec requires both client and server-side validation but client only validates name and password
Empty state message not implemented in TaskList - spec requires 'No tasks yet. Add your first task above!' but component displays nothing when tasks array is empty

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session cookie named 'session' instead of specified 'todo-session'
Error response format incorrect - using { error: 'message' } instead of { error: { code: 'ERROR_CODE', message: 'Human-readable message' } }
Bulk operations not wrapped in db.transaction() - clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks are plain queries without transaction wrapper
Dashboard displays mock user data 'User' instead of fetching actual user name from database via getCurrentUser() or API endpoint

type3_extraneous.reasoning: CSV export endpoint not mentioned in API specification section 6 - provides GET /api/export to download tasks as CSV
